backend/main.mo: Defines core backend types and state for products, updates, contacts, users, orders, sessions, and site settings, with initial maps and counters.
feature_evidence.json: Contains a feature evidence report listing removed Internet Identity admin auth and the affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short summaries of various frontend files including admin pages, components, utilities, and hooks.
frontend/.redeploy-trigger: Trigger file indicating a forced rebuild and redeploy request with metadata.
frontend/docs/custom-domain.md: Documentation describing how to configure a custom domain for the Beemedha app on the Internet Computer.
frontend/docs/rebuild-redeploy.md: Guide explaining how to perform a fresh rebuild and redeploy without functional changes.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and theme CSS defining color tokens, fonts, dark mode, and honeycomb background utilities.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template that loads the React app entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app router setup with public and admin routes, guarded by AdminRouteGuard, using TanStack Router and React Query.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Component that checks admin session validity and redirects to login if invalid, rendering children only when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/admin/OwnerOnlyR: Empty placeholder file for an owner-only route guard.
frontend/src/components/auth/CustomerLog: Customer login and session dialog supporting email/phone login, profile display, delivery address, and order history.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: A login/logout button using Internet Identity with error handling and dynamic UI states.
frontend/src/components/brand/BrandPrimi: Reusable styled layout components like sections, containers, cards, badges, and buttons.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Site footer with branding, social links, navigation links, and a newsletter signup form.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Responsive header with logo, navigation, customer login handling, and mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Wraps pages with header and footer for public routes and minimal layout for admin routes.
frontend/src/components/news/NewsCard.ts: Card displaying a product update with type badge, date, title, and message preview.
frontend/src/components/orders/DeliveryA: Form for creating or editing a delivery address with validation and optional action buttons.
frontend/src/components/orders/PlaceOrde: Dialog for saving an address and placing an order with success and error handling.
frontend/src/components/products/PriceDi: Price display component showing formatted price, original price, and discount info.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Displays a product card with image, availability, description, price, and variant count, linking to the product details page.
frontend/src/components/products/Purchas: Shows a disabled Add to Cart button and an alert indicating checkout is coming soon.
frontend/src/components/products/Variant: Renders a selector for weight or flavor variants and notifies parent on variant changes with price and label.
frontend/src/config/owner.ts: Defines the owner principal and provides a helper to check if a given principal matches it.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Handles admin session login, validation, persistence, and logout using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomerSession.ts: Manages customer sessions with validation, login, logout, and stored customer info.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth state.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdminRoute.ts: Checks if the current route path starts with /admin.
frontend/src/hooks/useLiveUpdateConfig.t: Returns config for periodic data refetching and focus-based updates.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageMeta.ts: Sets the document title and meta description based on provided values.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating product, settings, and contact data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Re-exports the root CSS file by importing ../index.css.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider and renders App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Displays the About page using site settings content with fallback text and branded layout components.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminAccessPage: Empty file with no implementation provided.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Displays an admin dashboard with navigation cards for managing products, news, logo, settings, and orders.
Provides an admin login form with validation, session handling, and redirects upon successful authentication.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLogoPage.t: Allows admins to view the current logo and upload a new one with validation and preview support.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminNewsPage.t: Enables creating, listing, and deleting product news updates linked to specific products.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Shows a table of customer orders with status updates and detailed order view capabilities.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin UI for listing, filtering, creating, editing, and deleting products with variant handling and stock management.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSiteSettin: Admin form for loading, editing, and saving site-wide settings such as images, content, and contact details.
frontend/src/pages/CertificationsPage.ts: Renders certifications content and optional image sourced from site settings with styled info cards.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation and submission plus contact info loaded from site settings.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page with hero section, navigation buttons, and highlight cards promoting honey quality.
frontend/src/pages/NewsDetailPage.tsx: Displays a detailed view of a single news update with metadata, related product info, and navigation handling.
frontend/src/pages/NewsPage.tsx: Shows a list of product updates with tab-based filtering, sorting, and last-updated timestamps.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Renders the site's privacy policy with sections for data collection, usage, and security.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Presents detailed product information, variant selection, availability, related updates, and ordering options.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Lists products with category-based filtering, tab navigation, and update timestamps.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Renders the Terms & Conditions page with sections on agreement, website use, product info, orders, and shipping.
frontend/src/utils/assets.ts: Encodes the filename portion of asset URLs to ensure images load correctly.
frontend/src/utils/logo.ts: Converts backend logo binary data into a browser object URL and provides a safe cleanup helper.
frontend/src/utils/price.ts: Utility functions for formatting INR prices, detecting discounts, and preparing display pricing data.
frontend/src/utils/principal.ts: Validates and formats Dfinity principal strings with error handling and truncation helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project state, feature requests, and architectural direction regarding admin authentication changes.
